title: 03/19/2021 - HOUR 1 - Wentz, Gruden, Bears
itunes:title: 03/19/2021 - HOUR 1 - Wentz, Gruden, Bears
description:
Carson Wentz is in a better situation with the Colts

Raiders HC Jon Gruden has too much power

Andy Dalton isn't mobile enough to be the QB for the Bears


Guest: Brock Huard
